nodes.text: Army of the Wookiee Trade Guild
The Army of the Wookiee Trade Guild was a group of Wookiees that defended the Wookiee Trade Guild.

They fought in the Battle of Kashyyyk that took place in 28 BBY, at the beginning of the Separatist Crisis. The army was completely destroyed by the Trade Federation's battle droids and the Sith Lord Darth Tyranus, who led the attack.
